title: Math Homework Taking Too Long? Here's What to Do
description: Practical solutions when math homework is consuming your entire evening and causing family stress.
imageAlt: Frustrated child with pile of homework

content.intro: A 20-minute assignment is taking 90 minutes. There are tears. The whole evening is consumed. Sound familiar? Here's how to fix it.

sections.text: If your child's math homework regularly exceeds these, something is wrong – either the assignment is too much, or there's a skill gap.

rows: Stuck on many problems, doesn't know how to start
Time passes but little work done

items: Talk to the teacher – get assessment of what's missing
Focus on foundation skills at home
Don't force completion of work that's beyond them
Use a timer to create awareness
Break work into chunks with short breaks
Start with easiest problems for momentum

sections.text: It's okay to write a note to the teacher: "We worked on this for 45 minutes. This is what we were able to complete." Most teachers would rather know about struggles than get forced completion.
Teachers can't help if they don't know. Let them know:

items: Where your child is getting stuck
Whether this is a regular pattern

sections.text: Teachers may modify assignments, provide extra support, or identify underlying issues.

faq.question: Should I just let them turn in incomplete homework?
faq.answer: Sometimes yes. After a reasonable effort, it's better to stop than to make homework a nightly battle. Let the teacher know what happened.

faq.question: What if it's really just too much homework?
faq.answer: Talk to other parents. If everyone is struggling, bring concerns to the teacher or school together. Homework amounts aren't always calibrated perfectly.

faq.question: Should I help them to make it faster?
faq.answer: Be careful. Helping them understand is good. Doing the work for them creates dependency and doesn't reveal their actual skill level to the teacher.

cta.text: SoroKid provides efficient, targeted practice – building skills without consuming entire evenings.
